  • Method Details

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()

    • addReady

      public void addReady(int idUser)
      Adds a player to the ready players' list, if not already present
      Parameters:
      idUser - The idUser of the player to add (must be in the lobby)

    • removeReady

      public void removeReady(int idUser)
      Removes a player from the ready players' list
      Parameters:
      idUser - The idUser of the player to remove

    • getGameType

      public GameRuleEnum getGameType()

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(int idUser)
      Removes a player from the Lobby. If they were the host, the role is reassigned.
      If the last player is removed, the lobby is destroyed
      Parameters:
      idUser - The idUser of the player to remove (must be in the lobby)

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(int idUser)
      Adds a player to the Lobby. If he's the first player added, it becomes the host.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The idUser of the player to add

    • assignHost

      private void assignHost()
      Promotes a player as the host if the actual one left or has not been assigned yet

    • destroyLobby

      public void destroyLobby()
      Removes the lobby from the global active lobbies' list

    • destroyLobby

      public void destroyLobby(boolean kickPlayers)
      Destroys the lobby, removing it from the active lobbies list
      If there are players still in the lobby, remove them first
      If the parameter is set to false, then the method will only destroy the lobby if there are no players
      Parameters:
      kickPlayers - true if the lobby should be deleted and the players kicked

    • getHost

      public Integer getHost()
      Returns:
      the host of this lobby

    • getPlayers

      public List<Integer> getPlayers()
      Returns the list of the current players' user IDs
      Returns:
      the idUser of this lobby's players

    • isHost

      public boolean isHost(int idUser)
      Checks whether the user is the host of this lobby
      Parameters:
      idUser - the user we're checking for
      Returns:
      true if idUser is equal to this.host

    • everyoneReady

      public boolean everyoneReady()
      Tests whether every player in the lobby is ready by comparing the players and playersReady lists
      Returns:
      true if every player in the lobby is ready

    • setStartGame

      public void setStartGame(boolean status)

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()

    • setModified

      public void setModified(boolean modified)

      public boolean isModified()
